alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:05PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A shower with gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Delaware County through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Branch, or 15 miles south of Walton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Andes, Fishs Eddy, Harvard, Downsville, Corbett, East Branch, Peabrook, Roscoe, Russell Brook Campsite and Wolf Hollow. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 89 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
